# Save to a file called transaction
Original:

echo -ne "\x00\xbb\x30\x32\x30\x30\x37\x32\x30\x34\x30\x30\x30\x30\x32\x30\x38\x63\x38\x30\x30\x30\x31\x38\x35\x34\x33\x32\x31\x30\x38\x38\x38\x38\x31\x33\x33\x37\x38\x38\x38\x35\x30\x30\x30\x30\x37\x32\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x31\x34\x36\x33\x30\x30\x31\x31\x31\x32\x31\x39\x32\x34\x30\x37\x31\x32\x32\x34\x33\x37\x35\x34\x33\x32\x31\x30\x38\x38\x38\x38\x31\x33\x33\x37\x38\x39\x3d\x31\x32\x32\x34\x31\x31\x31\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x38\x37\x34\x30\x30\x30\x35\x39\x32\x33\x38\x35\x34\x34\x42\x35\x34\x33\x32\x31\x30\x38\x38\x38\x38\x31\x33\x33\x37\x38\x39\x5e\x4d\x6f\x6d\x65\x6e\x74\x75\x6d\x5e\x31\x32\x32\x34\x31\x31\x31\x30\x30\x30\x30\x38\x37\x34\x30\x30\x30\x30\x31\x36\x34\x31\x31\x31\x31\x33\x32\x32\x34\x32\x33\x35\x31\x33\x32\x37\x38\x31\x30" > transaction


Modified (\x00\xbb to \x00\0xbd because the length):

echo -ne "\x00\xbd\x30\x32\x30\x30\x37\x32\x30\x34\x30\x30\x30\x30\x32\x30\x38\x63\x38\x30\x30\x30\x31\x38\x35\x34\x33\x32\x31\x30\x38\x38\x38\x38\x31\x33\x33\x37\x38\x38\x38\x35\x30\x30\x30\x30\x37\x32\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x31\x33\x33\x37\x30\x30\x31\x31\x31\x32\x31\x39\x32\x34\x30\x37\x31\x32\x32\x34\x33\x37\x35\x34\x33\x32\x31\x30\x38\x38\x38\x38\x31\x33\x33\x37\x38\x39\x3d\x31\x32\x32\x34\x31\x31\x31\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x30\x38\x37\x34\x30\x30\x30\x35\x39\x32\x33\x38\x35\x34\x34\x42\x35\x34\x33\x32\x31\x30\x38\x38\x38\x38\x31\x33\x33\x37\x38\x39\x5e\x4d\x6f\x6d\x65\x6e\x74\x75\x6d\x5e\x31\x32\x32\x34\x31\x31\x31\x30\x30\x30\x30\x38\x37\x34\x30\x30\x30\x30\x31\x38\x34\x33\x35\x32\x31\x33\x33\x37\x31\x33\x33\x37\x31\x33\x33\x37\x31\x30\x38\x31\x30" > transaction
